Question: This person finished the game with 163 passing yards, allowing him to overtake 40,000 in his career.
Hints: In the Wild Card game against Denver, this person passed for 458 yards and 4 touchdowns.
This person had never missed an NFL game in his career, but was forced to miss the entire 2011 season.
This person, along with his brother Eli, volunteered their assistance in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
